quotes.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I would rather sit on a pumpkin and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
